subject: New Assignment Posted - Calculus Problem Set #5
message: A new assignment has been posted for Advanced Mathematics. Please check the details and due date. The assignment is due December 20th at 11:59 PM.

subject: Physics Class Update - Lab Schedule Change
message: Important update: The physics lab scheduled for this Friday has been moved to next Monday at the same time. Please adjust your schedules accordingly.

subject: Reminder: Shakespeare Essay Due Tomorrow
message: This is a friendly reminder that your Shakespeare essay analyzing Hamlet is due tomorrow at 12:00 PM. Please ensure you submit it on time through the class portal.

subject: History Class - Guest Speaker Next Week
message: We're excited to announce that Dr. Sarah Mitchell, a World War II historian, will be joining our class next Wednesday to discuss primary source research methods.

subject: New Lab Assignment - Chemical Reactions
message: A new lab assignment has been posted for Chemistry Honors. The lab focuses on chemical reactions and is due December 15th at 4:00 PM. Please bring your safety equipment.
